messages.1000086408:
Begin accumulating Fury and deal damage equal to your Max Physical Damage.
When attacking, your Strength increases for #y{0}#w sec based on your HP, and you obtain Fury faster.
#yAt {1}% HP, obtain Fury every {2} sec
At {3}% HP, obtain STR +{4}% and Fury every {5} sec
At {6}% HP, obtain STR +{7}% and Fury every {8} sec 
At {9}% HP, obtain STR +{10}% and Fury every {11} sec,  Duration: {12} sec, Chance to strike with Max Physical Damage: {13}%, Cooldown: {14} sec
